page.title: 11PLAY SPACE IN N.E.WORCESTER2
page.content: Me and my grandad and Sam the dog go up the Gorse at the back of Eskdale Close .It is a massive place to play.Dead Man's Valley is a really deep pit at the top of the Gorse.It is about 60 feet deep.If you fall in you can't get out again.People say there are bones buried there from people who have fallen in! I have got a B.M.X.track in the back garden.We have a ramp and a water pipe.We put a skid at the bottom,and a grass heap in the middle.There is a proper B.M.X. track at Warndon made of clay and old tyres. We make a play house in the garden. Tamsyn's play house is just like a real house. It's in the back toilet. Stevan has a base at Mayfield carpark.It has windows and a shelter.It's made of stone.Colin has a base on the Gorse.
